text: Kevin Arthur Moore (born 29 July 1990) is a sprinter competing internationally for Malta. He initially represented Australia before switching allegiance to Malta, the country of birth of his late father, where Kevin also lived for the first six years of his life.2014 CWG bio He competed in the 400 metres at the 2013 World Championships without advancing from the first round. In June 2016, he tested positive for three illegal substances and was banned from competition for four years. His sanction lasts from 11 June 2016 until 24 September 2020. He is of Greek Cypriot Australian descent, through his mother. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2008 |rowspan=2|Commonwealth Youth Games |rowspan=2|Pune,
